transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai madam?
Customer: Ji ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Mera naam Jitesh hai.
Executive: Ji, good morning sir. Mera naam Jitesh hai. Maine abhi hai na upgrade karwaya hai mera membership.
Customer: Kya karaya sir aapne?
Customer: Maine abhi usme upgrade karwaya mera membership.
Executive: Okay, aap number bataiye apna ek bari.
Customer: 900
Executive: 900
Customer: 1377
Executive: 1377
Customer: 389
Executive: 389. Ji.
Executive: Sir thank you sir.
Customer: Actually me maine abhi maximizer plan liya tha madam.
Executive: Maximizer, haan ji chal rahi hai maximizer.
Customer: Theek hai na?
Executive: Haan, usme mera total payment ban raha tha ₹1,18,000 ke aas pass me.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Maine do payment clear kar liye hai. Abhi ek ₹32,000 remaining payment baki hai mera.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Mere ko ek Tiwari karke sir hai. Theek hai na? Unhone mere ko ye bola tha ki aap ₹1,18,000 ka ye package le lo. Hum aapko 50 unlexible leads aur uske alawa hum aapka 50 mere paas me iska proof bhi hai madam.
Executive: 50 non lexible leads, theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aur whatsapp SMS service cashback ki. Aapka cashback 11-12000 jo ho raha hai uski hum aapko uske sath me hum aapko SMS service restart karwa denge. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ab madam IndiaMART se mere ko ye bol rahe hai ki aur aapko ₹6000 dene padenge uske alawa remaining payment ke alawa ₹6000 you can give me more then we can restart this whatsapp service me pagal thodi na madam. Aapke aapke commitments me me khada hu. Theek hai na? Aapne jo bola wo maine pay kiya. Remaining payment abhi baki hai ₹32000. Aur uske alawa madam abhi me service bol raha hu to wo service ke about me mere ko ye bol rahe hai ki ₹6000 aur lagenge. Me Gujarat chod ke madam Delhi ki taraf aaya. Maine waha pe account karwaya mera membership waha pe to me Gujarat me bhi karwa deta na madam.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Me kyu aaya fir Delhi ki taraf?
Executive: Theek hai. Ek bar me cross verify kara leti hu team se fir aapko connect karti hu. Mujhe aap 15-20 minute ka time dijiye please.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer upgraded membership and took maximizer plan.

- Was promised 50 unlexible leads and WhatsApp SMS service.

- Now asked to pay ₹6000 more for WhatsApp service.

- Questions why he came to Delhi for membership.



Resolution:

- Executive will cross-verify with the team.

- Asked for 15-20 minutes to connect back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect back after verification.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- membership, upgrade, maximizer plan, whatsapp service, payment
